subject: Paula Zahn Now Inside the TB Scare:  Who's at Risk?
body:
Tonight On CNN Email







May 30, 2007








 





8 p.m. ET


 

Paula Zahn Now:  Who's at Risk?


Forbidden to fly, did a man with TB put others at risk on his trip overseas? Alarming questions over exposure -- who's at risk? Watch tonight, 8 ET.



































Related:• Man Knew he had TB Before flying to Europe







 
 





 




6:00 a.m. ET


 

American Morning


More and more Americans are hitting the road in convertibles, but are they as safe as hard tops? We're putting some of the most popular models to the test.












 





7:00 p.m. ET


 

The Situation Room


May has been the deadliest month of the year for U.S. troops in Iraq. Is the effort to secure Baghdad worth the price?







8:00 p.m. ET


 

Paula Zahn NOW


Forbidden to fly, did a man with TB put others at risk on his trip overseas? Alarming questions over exposure - who's at risk?







9:00 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live


Hollywood exes dumped by Trump, Stallone and K Fed: they're getting angry and getting even! Can they help real people overcome cheating and broken hearts?







10:00 p.m. ET


 

Anderson Cooper 360


It was supposed to be the journey of a young girl's life: helping orphans in Ghana. Instead, her school trip turned deadly. And her parents want answers. What went wrong?
